item.title: Discrete Dictionary-based Decomposition Layer for Structured Representation Learning
item.description: Boosting structured representation learning, a novel Discrete Dictionary-based Decomposition (D3) layer significantly improves systematic generalization in TPR-based models by efficiently decomposing …
